屔字的基本解释

屔
ní
四边高、中间低、可以蓄水的山丘。
古同“??”，山名。

屔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ní］
［《廣韻》奴低切，平齊，泥。］
(1)受水的山丘。
(2)山名。

屔字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【尸字部】　屔； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页302第09
【廣韻】【集韻】?奴低切，音泥。【爾雅·釋丘】水潦所止，屔丘。亦作泥。【郭註】反頂受水。　又【集韻】女夷切，音尼。山名。

屔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
屔字的起名意思

暂无。

Cock
Basic explanation of words
Cock
ní
A hill with high sides and low middle, which can store water.
The ancient same "??", the name of the mountain.
Cock
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ní]
["Guangyun" slave low-cut, flat, muddy. ]
(1) Hills subject to water.
(2) The name of the mountain.
Cock
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[First Collection of Yin] [Department of Corpse Characters] 　屔; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 302 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Slave low cut, sound mud. 【Erya·Shuqiu】The water stops, Qiqiu. Also made mud. [Guo's Note] Reversed and received water.　[Jiyun] Female Yi cuts, Yinni. Mountain name.
Cock
